Interface IUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
UI
public interface IUI

public interface IUI public An interface for a game's user interface

Author:
Omer Shenhar and Shachar Butnaro

askNumericQuestion

                       int lowerBound,
                       int upperBound)
method int askNumericQuestion(String question, int lowerBound, int upperBound) public Asks the player a question and returns an integer within the specified bounds.

Parameters:
question - - A String depicting the question asked.
lowerBound - - The lowest integer that can be returned.
upperBound - - The highest integer that can be returned.
Returns:
- The integer received from user, within bounds.

askOfferableSellQuestions

void askOfferableSellQuestions(Player player,
                               buyOffer offer,
                               OfferType type,
                               boolean multipleSelection)
method void askOfferableSellQuestions(Player player, buyOffer offer, OfferType type, boolean multipleSelection) public Displays the list of Assets/Groups available to sell and prompts the user to choose.

Parameters:
player - - The valid non-null player
offer - - An initialized helper offer which fills up with the player's choice.
type - - Assets/Groups
multipleSelection - - Signifies whether the player can select one or many assets/groups.
